title: DuckDB C API function group definition
description: The schema of a C API function group definition. Function group definitions are the main component of the C API header generation.

group.description: The group name of this function group.

deprecated.description: Marks the entire function group as deprecated, if true.

use_instead.description: Pointers on what functionality to use, if the entire function group is marked as deprecated.

description.description: A top-level usage description of the function group.

entries.description: The array of function definitions in this group.

return_type.description: The return type of the function.

deprecated.description: Marks the function as deprecated, if true.

outdated.description: Marks the function as outdated, if true.

use_instead.description: Pointers on what functionality to use, if the function is marked as deprecated or outdated.

param_comments.description: A comment on each function parameter.

param_destroy_functions.description: Which parameters to destroy, and how.

return_value.description: A comment on the return value.

return_value_destroy_function.function: The function to destroy the return value with, if applicable.
